intro.description: We've got a Debrief plot file pre-prepared to let you avoid some of the steps in the single-leg tutorial, called L2_Scenario.xml.

item.title: Find the data file
item.description: The data-file for this tutorial is contained in the SATC sub-folder, as were the files used in the previous tutorial.

item.title: Drag in the file
item.description:
Before you load the data-file, close any existing Debrief plots, then drag in the L2_Scenario.xml data-file from the SATC folder we used in the previous tutorial.
You will see a Blue Ownship track, with a bearing fan in nice pretty shades of green, purple and red.
